title: "Fairmont Catholic School robotics team preps for upcoming competition"
excerpt: "The school’s robotics team will be competing for the first time in the First Lego League Challenge competition in December at Fairmont State. However, part of the competition’s structure asks its young participants to consider how robotics might be used to help the local community."
